channel.title: [317]add players online to top screen[317]
channel.description: can anybody give me like an code to add to my server so like when your logged in its has the players on the top

item.title: [317]add players online to top screen[317]
item.dc:creator: @Raams Raams
item.description:
@Raams wrote:

You could search for where it loads the client and where it adds the interfaces on the client.java and add a interface in there and make it at the top of the screen then add like, “There are currently” +playersOnline+ “players online!”

Its prob not +playersOnline+ but thats just an example…

Read full topic

item.title: [317]add players online to top screen[317]
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

[quote=“Digital Hotdogs, post:6, topic:260830”] public void writePlayers() { int players = PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount(); sendFrame126("@gre@Players online ☺ " + players, 6570); sendFrame126("Another message here", 6572); sendFrame126("Another message here", 6664); setInterfaceWalkable(6673); }

Search hasntLoggedin = true;
Add this writePlayers();

If it’s not what you want post here and I will write another one [/quote]Thank you.

Read full topic

item.title: [317]add players online to top screen[317]
item.dc:creator: @Digital_Hotdogs Digital Hotdogs
item.description:
@Digital_Hotdogs wrote:

public void writePlayers() { int players = PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount(); sendFrame126("@gre@Players online ☺ " + players, 6570); sendFrame126("Another message here", 6572); sendFrame126("Another message here", 6664); setInterfaceWalkable(6673); }

Search hasntLoggedin = true;
Add this writePlayers();

If it’s not what you want post here and I will write another one

It’s how i learned.[/quote]no trust me i just liked to know where i can get code from and where to put it but thnx[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 06, 2009, 11:36:32 pm[/size][hr]btw i just seen some pics on allstarscape but they dont have them
